entry.template_body:
Name Department
Priority Doc Type
 
◆ Marriage
Spouse Fullname Age  year old
Wedding Date     ～ New Surname:
Wedding Location
 
◆ Wedding (Son/Daughter)
Son/Daughter's Name Age  year old
Wedding Date     ～ Relationship
Wedding Location
 
◆ Giving Birth (Herself/Spouse)
Giving Birth Date
Child's Name Relationship
 
◆ Condolence
Deceased Person's Name Age  year old
Deceased Date Relationship
Vigil   
Funeral   
Chief mourner Living Together/Not Together
 
◆ Injury
Disease Name Hospital Days  ～ 
Hospital's Name  i.e. Hospital
 
◆ Disaster
Disaster Thing  i.e. House　First Floor
Disaster Reason  i.e. gas
Disaster Level  i.e exploison based on gas leaking
 
Remarks
